examples: she achieved her goal despite setbacks

definitions.text: reach a point in time, or a certain state or level
examples: This car can reach a speed of 140 miles per hour
the archeologists chanced upon an old tomb
The hikers finally struck the main path to the lake

definitions.text: reach a destination, either real or abstract
examples: We barely made it to the finish line
I have to hit the MAC machine before the weekend starts
